entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:29 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
